plot: When Lubuvitcher Chasid Avram Liebelson learns of his infertility, he thinks his vow of celibacy pleases G-d, but it certainly doesn't please his wife Shoshe.
title: The Shabbos Goy
plot_es: When Lubuvitcher Chasid Avram Liebelson learns of his infertility, he thinks his vow of celibacy pleases G-d, but it certainly doesn't please his wife Shoshe.
plot_en: When Lubuvitcher Chasid Avram Liebelson learns of his infertility, he thinks his vow of celibacy pleases G-d, but it certainly doesn't please his wife Shoshe.
